name: fc movil
css: @-moz-document url-prefix("http://m.forocoches.com"), url-prefix("https://m.forocoches.com") { *:not(:empty):not([onclick*="open"]):not(SPAN):not([class*="stars"]):not([id*="stars"]):not([id="rating"]):not([class="rating"]):not([class*="SPRITE"]):not([id*="SPRITE"]):not([id*="lbImage"]):not([class*='shurmenu']):not([class*="iradio_square-blue"]) { background-image: none !important } HTML, BODY { background: none #141414 !important } BODY * {background-color: transparent !important} DIV[id]:not([id*="scroll"]):not([class*='arrow']) {background-color: inherit !important} SPAN:not(:empty):not([class*="icon"]):not([id*="icon"]):not([class*="star"]):not([id*="star"]):not([id*="rating"]):not([class*="rating"]):not([class*="Sprite"]):not([class*="sprite"]) { background: none transparent !important; border-color: #000 !important} html:root > BODY > * > * > * > *:not(INPUT):not([onclick]) > DIV:not(:empty):not([id]) {background: none #1c1c1c !important} SUMMARY, DETAILS {background-color: inherit !important} ABBR, PROGRESS, TIME, LABEL, .date {color: #CDEFC2 !important} MARK, CODE, PRE, BLOCKQUOTE, [class*="quote"], TD[style*="inset"][class="alt2"] { background-color: #00090F !important } HEADER, #header {background: -moz-linear-gradient(#333,#141414) transparent !important;} #header h1 {background-color: transparent !important;} H1, H2 { background: none #28313E !important; border-radius: 5px !important; -moz-border-radius: 5px !important; -webkit-border-radius: 5px !important;} H3, H4 { background: none #2A3731 !important; border-radius: 5px !important; -moz-border-radius: 5px !important; -webkit-border-radius: 5px !important;} H5, H6 {background: none #372A2A !important} DT {background-color: #2B3135 !important} DL, DD {background-color: #232323 !important} LI, UL {background-color: inherit !important} LI A:not([class*="icon"]):not([id*="icon"]):not([onclick]), DT A:not([class*="icon"]):not([id*="icon"]):not([onclick]) {background-image: none !important; text-indent: 0 !important} LI[class*="item"] A:hover, LI[class*="item"]:hover, [class*="menuitem"]:hover {background-color: #2E2B2F !important} TABLE {background-color: #232323 !important; border-color: #333 !important} TABLE TABLE {background: #191919 !important;} TH, CAPTION {background-color: #353535 !important} INPUT *, TEXTAREA * {color: #DDD !important;} HTML BODY INPUT:not([type="image"]), button, HTML BODY TEXTAREA { background: none #353535 !important; -moz-appearance: none !important; -webkit-appearance: none !important; color: #DDD !important; border: solid 1px #777 !important; border-radius: 0 !important; -moz-border-radius: 0 !important; -webkit-border-radius: 0 !important; opacity: 1 !important;} HTML BODY INPUT[type="checkbox"] {-moz-appearance: checkbox !important; -webkit-appearance: checkbox !important;} HTML BODY INPUT[type="radio"] {-moz-appearance: radio !important; -webkit-appearance: radio !important;} HTML:root INPUT[type="button"], HTML:root INPUT[type="submit"], HTML:root INPUT[type="reset"], HTML:root BUTTON { color: #EEE !important; background-color: #222437 !important; -moz-box-shadow: inset 0 1px rgba(255,255,255,0.2), inset 0 10px rgba(255,255,255,0.1), inset 0 10px 20px rgba(255,255,255,0.15), inset 0 -15px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.2) !important; -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 1px rgba(255,255,255,0.2), inset 0 10px rgba(255,255,255,0.1), inset 0 10px 20px rgba(255,255,255,0.15), inset 0 -15px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.2) !important;} HTML:root INPUT[type="button"]:hover, HTML:root INPUT[type="submit"]:hover, HTML:root INPUT[type="reset"]:hover, HTML:root BUTTON:hover { color: #FFF !important; background-color: #31344F !important; border-color: #5F687F !important; -moz-box-shadow: inset 0 1px rgba(255,255,255,0.3), inset 0 10px rgba(255,255,255,0.2), inset 0 10px 20px rgba(255,255,255,0.25), inset 0 -15px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.3) !important; -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 1px rgba(255,255,255,0.3), inset 0 10px rgba(255,255,255,0.2), inset 0 10px 20px rgba(255,255,255,0.25), inset 0 -15px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.3) !important;} HTML:root INPUT[type="image"] {opacity: .85 !important} HTML:root INPUT[type="image"]:hover {opacity: .95 !important} SELECT, OPTION, optgroup{ background: none #383838 !important; border-color:#555 !important; color:#f1f1f1 !important; -moz-appearance: none !important;} ADDRESS {background: none #333 !important} HR {background: none #444 !important} .current {color: #FFF !important;} IMG[src*="spacer"]:empty, [id*="round"]:empty, [id*="bottom"]:empty, [class*="bottom"]:empty, [class*="Bottom"]:empty, [id*="top"]:empty, [class*="top"]:empty, [class*="Top"]:empty, [class*="spacer"]:empty {background-image: none !important;} NAV, MENU, HTML BODY [class*="open"], HTML BODY [id*="Dropdown"], HTML BODY [id*="dropdown"], HTML BODY [class*="Dropdown"], HTML BODY [class*="dropdown"], HTML BODY [id*="menu"]:not(SELECT), HTML BODY [class*="menu"]:NOT(SELECT), HTML BODY [class*="tooltip"], HTML BODY [class*="popup"], HTML BODY [id*="popup"], HTML BODY [class*="note"], HTML BODY [class*="detail"], HTML BODY [class*="description"] {background-color: #232323 !important} [class*="content"], [class*="container"] {background-color: #1c1c1c !important} [id*="masthead"] a,[id*="header"] a, [id*="logo"] a, [class*="logo"] a {text-indent: 0 !important;} HTML:root BODY [class*="layer"], HTML:root BODY #lightbox-nav, HTML:root BODY #imageContainer {background-color: transparent !important} html *:after:not([class*='arrow']), html *:before:not([class*='arrow']) {color: #CCC !important; border-color: #666 !important; background: none transparent !important} * { color: #CCC !important; border-color: #444 !important; outline-color: #444 !important; text-shadow: none !important;} a:link, a:link *:not(IMG){ color: #B1CBF7 !important; background-color: transparent !important; border-color: #666 !important;} a:visited, a:visited * {color: #CDB4E7 !important;} a:hover, a:hover *:not(IMG){ color: #FFE900 !important; background-color: #363037 !important; border-color: #999 !important} html [href*="#"]:hover {color: #FFE900 !important; background-color: transparent !important;} [onclick], [ondblclick], [onmousedown] {color: #DFD5BC !important; text-indent: 0 !important} [onclick]:hover, [ondblclick]:hover, [onmousedown]:hover {color: #FEFF97 !important;} IMG { opacity: .75 !important;} IMG:hover { opacity: 1 !important; background-color: #888 !important; } svg {background: none #666 !important;} ::-moz-selection {background-color: #626F61 !important; color: #F6F7B9 !important;} .g .r {background-color: transparent !important;} div.vsc:hover > .vspi, div.vso > .vspi {background: none transparent !important; border: none !important;} /* -------------------------------------------------------- ** Aquí empiezan las reglas creadas exclusivas para el foro ** -------------------------------------------------------- */ /* Funcionalidad Anti-Spoilers. Las palabras escritas en color blanco, del color del post o del color de una cita ** cambian de color a negro, de forma que para leerlas ha de pasarse el ratón por encima. */ font[color="white"],[color="#f1f1f1"]{ color: #141414 !important; background: #141414 !important; } font[color="#dedede"]{ color: #000406 !important; background: #000406 !important; } font[color="white"]:hover,[color="#f1f1f1"]:hover,[color="#dedede"]:hover { color: white !important; background: none !important; } div.spoiler, div.spoiler:hover { color: #141414 !important; background: #141414 !important; cursor: auto !important; } div.spoiler:hover { color: #CCC !important; font-weight: normal; max-height: none !important; } /* Las siguientes reglas sustituyen las imágenes que peor se ven en un fondo negro, aquellas con reborde blanco ** por la misma imagen pero sin el reborde para mejorar la estética del foro. */ img[src*="top_c1"]{ width:0 !important; height:45px !important; padding-right:121px !important; background:transparent url(http://abload.de/img/coche6gkdq.png) top left no-repeat !important; } img[src*="top_c2_fcs"]{ width:0 !important; height:px !important; padding-right:252px !important; background:transparent url(http://img.imgur.com/BrnNY0i.png) top left no-repeat !important; } img[src*="forocoches_recarga.png"]{ width:0 !important; height: 32px !important; padding-right:32px !important; background:transparent url(http://abload.de/img/forocoches_recargav8ecv.png) top left no-repeat !important; } img[src*="statusicon/thread.gif"]{ width:0 !important; height:20px !important; padding-right:20px !important; background:transparent url(http://img.imgur.com/nvha2vA.png) top left no-repeat !important; } img[src*="statusicon/thread_dot.gif"]{ width:0 !important; height:20px !important; padding-right:20px !important; background:transparent url(http://img.imgur.com/cOx089s.png) top left no-repeat !important; } img[src*="statusicon/thread_dot_hot.gif"]{ width:0 !important; height:20px !important; padding-right:20px !important; background:transparent url(http://img.imgur.com/MBXbepY.png) top left no-repeat !important; } img[src*="statusicon/thread_dot_new.gif"]{ width:0 !important; height:20px !important; } /* ** Las siguientes reglas hacen que se muestren los colores de la paleta de colores, ya que el Midnight Surfing ** no lo hace. */ #vB_Editor_001_color_White div { background-color: white !important; } #vB_Editor_001_color_Plum div { background-color: rgb(221, 160, 221) !important; } #vB_Editor_001_color_LightBlue div { background-color: rgb(173, 216, 230) !important; } #vB_Editor_001_color_PaleTurquoise div { background-color: rgb(175, 238, 238) !important; } #vB_Editor_001_color_PaleTurquoise div { background-color: rgb(175, 238, 238) !important; } #vB_Editor_001_color_PaleGreen div { background-color: rgb(152, 251, 152) !important; } #vB_Editor_001_color_LemonChiffon div { background-color: rgb(255, 250, 205) !important; } #vB_Editor_001_color_Wheat div { background-color: rgb(245, 222, 179) !important; } #vB_Editor_001_color_Pink div { background-color: rgb(255, 192, 203) !important; } #vB_Editor_001_color_Pink div { background-color: rgb(255, 192, 203) !important; } #vB_Editor_001_color_Silver div { background-color: silver !important; } #vB_Editor_001_color_DarkOrchid div { background-color: rgb(153, 50, 204) !important; } #vB_Editor_001_color_DeepSkyBlue div { background-color: rgb(0, 191, 255) !important; } iframe#infocoches { display: none !important; } /* ** Al usar el buscador, la palabra buscada se resalta en rojo, como siempre. */ span.highlight { color: red !important; } /* ** Al recibir mensajes privados el apartado del nombre de usuario cambia de color. */ td.alt2[style*='background-color:#ffffcc'] { background-color: #3a404a !important;
